summary:
Experienced Head of Product / Ecommerce manager at high traffic webshops, marketplaces and apps. I have 15 years of Ecommerce experience of which 8 years leading cross-functional teams for companies like bol.com and Talpa eCommerce. 

Some experiences that I am proud of; set up bol.com marketplace platform, running and expanding a multi-country auction webshop. 70+ yearly AB-test experiments and improving conversion significant. Leading the change becoming self-managing teams.

During my career, I’ve worked in several roles such as Head of product, Ecommerce manager, Team Manager, Product Owner, Project manager and Program manager. I'm data- & result driven, love to experiment, connect people and I have a great feeling for Customer Experience and commercial opportunities.
